channel.title: [PI] Run.bat Help
channel.description:
Hi, So i DLed a PI source, it looked good. I edited my ip etc on client. I have a windows 7 comp, so on like 95% of 317's i click twice and it Closes client. Last time i made a server, i fixed it using
@echo off "C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit
It worked there, but when i try it on this i get this error.
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2qdaan8.png[/img]
Anyone willing to help?
Amreetitssteve@hotmail.com

item.title: [PI] Run.bat Help
item.dc:creator: @db0wzz db0wzz
item.description:
@db0wzz wrote:

Hi, So i DLed a PI source, it looked good. I edited my ip etc on client. I have a windows 7 comp, so on like 95% of 317’s i click twice and it Closes client. Last time i made a server, i fixed it using

@echo off
“C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe” -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

It worked there, but when i try it on this i get this error.

Anyone willing to help?

Amreetitssteve@hotmail.com

Read full topic
